title: Game window broken then the whole game broken
body:
This is quite a severe error since i can`t play LoL at all.
First it started as a broken window, leaving full screen for itself. I tried everything and it didn`t work, so i "rolled it over", since it wasn`t affecting a game a lot. Then, after a few more matches, game won`t work at all. Here is how it looks:
I started a custom match (i was testing if the bug is still present);
Normally picked champion and started the game;
But it opens a normal loading screen, but in window, instead of fullscreen, and not only that, it is "not responding" and after a few pointless clicks over mouse and keyboard it tells me: LoL cilent (TM).exe blablaba is not working and that Windows` pointless attempt to fix it;
BUUUUT
That is what happened before my test match.
What i tried here is to wait for it, randomly clicking the screen (idk why), and this happened:
The game DID uncolor, but it freeze. And after a few more minutes not moving from 0% i declared it will RIP and closed it, but without error message.
I hope you can do something about it (please don`t tell me to reinstall the game XD).
Best regards.

replies.body: Sorr, the thing is fixed, idk how, i was "pressing random buttons, but in command panel XD"

I'm not exactly sure what could be going on, but I'd like to help troubleshoot.  Are you using 4K at all?  As a first step, 4K is not something that we currently support so you'll have to reduce your resolution.  Second, if you recently updated Windows 10 I recommend disabling the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html), which has been causing the game to freeze for some players.

Finally, you may need to adjust your dpi settings to fit everything properly.  To do this:  Right click the LoL icon -> Properties -> Compatibility Tab -> Check the "Disable Display Scaling on High DPI Settings" Box.

I hope that helps!  If not, throw some more details at me and screenshots to help.
